SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM account WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account(id, email, password, name, phone) VALUES(account_seq.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET logindate = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{id}
